init.title: E-Redes Smart Metering Plus Configuration
init.description:
Configure your E-Redes Smart Metering Plus integration.

**Shared Webhook URL for ALL E-Redes Meters:**

{webhook_url}

**Important Notes:**
- This single webhook URL receives data for **all your E-Redes meters**
- Each meter (CPE) will automatically become a separate device in Home Assistant
- Configure this URL **once** in your E-Redes provider dashboard

**Setup Instructions:**
1. Copy the webhook URL above
2. Log into your E-Redes energy provider dashboard
3. Navigate to Smart Metering Plus settings
4. Configure the webhook endpoint with the copied URL
5. Enable data transmission for all your meters

data.webhook_url: Webhook URL - Copy this to your E-Redes provider dashboard
